And this is the thing<S>1697</S> that thou shalt do<S>6213</S> unto them to hallow<S>6942</S> them, to minister unto me in the priest's office<S>3547</S>: Take<S>3947</S> one<S>259</S> young<S>1121</S> <S>1241</S> bullock<S>6499</S>, and two<S>8147</S> rams<S>352</S> without blemish<S>8549</S>,
And unleavened<S>4682</S> bread<S>3899</S>, and cakes<S>2471</S> unleavened<S>4682</S> tempered<S>1101</S> with oil<S>8081</S>, and wafers<S>7550</S> unleavened<S>4682</S> anointed<S>4886</S> with oil<S>8081</S>: of wheaten<S>2406</S> flour<S>5560</S> shalt thou make<S>6213</S> them.
And thou shalt put<S>5414</S> them into one<S>259</S> basket<S>5536</S>, and bring<S>7126</S> them in the basket<S>5536</S>, with the bullock<S>6499</S> and the two<S>8147</S> rams<S>352</S>.
And Aaron<S>175</S> and his sons<S>1121</S> thou shalt bring<S>7126</S> unto the door<S>6607</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, and shalt wash<S>7364</S> them with water<S>4325</S>.
And thou shalt take<S>3947</S> the garments<S>899</S>, and put<S>3847</S> upon Aaron<S>175</S> the coat<S>3801</S>, and the robe<S>4598</S> of the ephod<S>646</S>, and the ephod<S>646</S>, and the breastplate<S>2833</S>, and gird<S>640</S> him with the curious girdle<S>2805</S> of the ephod<S>646</S>:
And thou shalt put<S>7760</S> the mitre<S>4701</S> upon his head<S>7218</S>, and put<S>5414</S> the holy<S>6944</S> crown<S>5145</S> upon the mitre<S>4701</S>.
Then shalt thou take<S>3947</S> the anointing<S>4888</S> oil<S>8081</S>, and pour<S>3332</S> it upon his head<S>7218</S>, and anoint<S>4886</S> him.
And thou shalt bring<S>7126</S> his sons<S>1121</S>, and put<S>3847</S> coats<S>3801</S> upon them.
And thou shalt gird<S>2296</S> them with girdles<S>73</S>, Aaron<S>175</S> and his sons<S>1121</S>, and put<S>2280</S> the bonnets<S>4021</S> on them: and the priest's office<S>3550</S> shall be theirs for a perpetual<S>5769</S> statute<S>2708</S>: and thou shalt consecrate<S>4390</S> <S>3027</S> Aaron<S>175</S> and his sons<S>1121</S>. <sup>put: Heb. bind</sup> <sup>consecrate: Heb. fill the hand of</sup>
And thou shalt cause a bullock<S>6499</S> to be brought<S>7126</S> before<S>6440</S> the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>: and Aaron<S>175</S> and his sons<S>1121</S> shall put<S>5564</S> their hands<S>3027</S> upon the head<S>7218</S> of the bullock<S>6499</S>.
And thou shalt kill<S>7819</S> the bullock<S>6499</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, by the door<S>6607</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>.
And thou shalt take<S>3947</S> of the blood<S>1818</S> of the bullock<S>6499</S>, and put<S>5414</S> it upon the horns<S>7161</S> of the altar<S>4196</S> with thy finger<S>676</S>, and pour<S>8210</S> all the blood<S>1818</S> beside<S>413</S> the bottom<S>3247</S> of the altar<S>4196</S>.
And thou shalt take<S>3947</S> all the fat<S>2459</S> that covereth<S>3680</S> the inwards<S>7130</S>, and the caul<S>3508</S> that is above the liver<S>3516</S>, and the two<S>8147</S> kidneys<S>3629</S>, and the fat<S>2459</S> that is upon them, and burn<S>6999</S> them upon the altar<S>4196</S>. <sup>the caul: it seemeth by anatomy, and the Hebrew doctors, to be the midriff</sup>
But the flesh<S>1320</S> of the bullock<S>6499</S>, and his skin<S>5785</S>, and his dung<S>6569</S>, shalt thou burn<S>8313</S> with fire<S>784</S> without<S>2351</S> the camp<S>4264</S>: it is a sin offering<S>2403</S>.
Thou shalt also take<S>3947</S> one<S>259</S> ram<S>352</S>; and Aaron<S>175</S> and his sons<S>1121</S> shall put<S>5564</S> their hands<S>3027</S> upon the head<S>7218</S> of the ram<S>352</S>.
And thou shalt slay<S>7819</S> the ram<S>352</S>, and thou shalt take<S>3947</S> his blood<S>1818</S>, and sprinkle<S>2236</S> it round about<S>5439</S> upon the altar<S>4196</S>.
And thou shalt cut<S>5408</S> the ram<S>352</S> in pieces<S>5409</S>, and wash<S>7364</S> the inwards<S>7130</S> of him, and his legs<S>3767</S>, and put<S>5414</S> them unto his pieces<S>5409</S>, and unto his head<S>7218</S>. <sup>unto: or, upon</sup>
And thou shalt burn<S>6999</S> the whole ram<S>352</S> upon the altar<S>4196</S>: it is a burnt offering<S>5930</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>: it is a sweet<S>5207</S> savour<S>7381</S>, an offering made by fire<S>801</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And thou shalt take<S>3947</S> the other<S>8145</S> ram<S>352</S>; and Aaron<S>175</S> and his sons<S>1121</S> shall put<S>5564</S> their hands<S>3027</S> upon the head<S>7218</S> of the ram<S>352</S>.
Then shalt thou kill<S>7819</S> the ram<S>352</S>, and take<S>3947</S> of his blood<S>1818</S>, and put<S>5414</S> it upon the tip<S>8571</S> of the right ear<S>241</S> of Aaron<S>175</S>, and upon the tip<S>8571</S> of the right<S>3233</S> ear<S>241</S> of his sons<S>1121</S>, and upon the thumb<S>931</S> of their right<S>3233</S> hand<S>3027</S>, and upon the great toe<S>931</S> of their right<S>3233</S> foot<S>7272</S>, and sprinkle<S>2236</S> the blood<S>1818</S> upon the altar<S>4196</S> round about<S>5439</S>.
And thou shalt take<S>3947</S> of the blood<S>1818</S> that is upon the altar<S>4196</S>, and of the anointing<S>4888</S> oil<S>8081</S>, and sprinkle<S>5137</S> it upon Aaron<S>175</S>, and upon his garments<S>899</S>, and upon his sons<S>1121</S>, and upon the garments<S>899</S> of his sons<S>1121</S> with him: and he shall be hallowed<S>6942</S>, and his garments<S>899</S>, and his sons<S>1121</S>, and his sons'<S>1121</S> garments<S>899</S> with him.
Also thou shalt take<S>3947</S> of the ram<S>352</S> the fat<S>2459</S> and the rump<S>451</S>, and the fat<S>2459</S> that covereth<S>3680</S> the inwards<S>7130</S>, and the caul<S>3508</S> above the liver<S>3516</S>, and the two<S>8147</S> kidneys<S>3629</S>, and the fat<S>2459</S> that is upon them, and the right<S>3225</S> shoulder<S>7785</S>; for it is a ram<S>352</S> of consecration<S>4394</S>:
And one<S>259</S> loaf<S>3603</S> of bread<S>3899</S>, and one<S>259</S> cake<S>2471</S> of oiled<S>8081</S> bread, and one<S>259</S> wafer<S>7550</S> out of the basket<S>5536</S> of the unleavened bread<S>4682</S> that is before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>:
And thou shalt put<S>7760</S> all in the hands<S>3709</S> of Aaron<S>175</S>, and in the hands<S>3709</S> of his sons<S>1121</S>; and shalt wave<S>5130</S> them for a wave offering<S>8573</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>. <sup>shalt wave: or, shalt shake to and fro</sup>
And thou shalt receive<S>3947</S> them of their hands<S>3027</S>, and burn<S>6999</S> them upon the altar<S>4196</S> for a burnt offering<S>5930</S>, for a sweet<S>5207</S> savour<S>7381</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>: it is an offering made by fire<S>801</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And thou shalt take<S>3947</S> the breast<S>2373</S> of the ram<S>352</S> of Aaron's<S>175</S> consecration<S>4394</S>, and wave<S>5130</S> it for a wave offering<S>8573</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>: and it shall be thy part<S>4490</S>.
And thou shalt sanctify<S>6942</S> the breast<S>2373</S> of the wave offering<S>8573</S>, and the shoulder<S>7785</S> of the heave offering<S>8641</S>, which is waved<S>5130</S>, and which is heaved up<S>7311</S>, of the ram<S>352</S> of the consecration<S>4394</S>, even of that which<S>834</S> is for Aaron<S>175</S>, and of that which is for his sons<S>1121</S>:
And it shall be Aaron's<S>175</S> and his sons'<S>1121</S> by a statute<S>2706</S> for ever<S>5769</S> from the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: for it is an heave offering<S>8641</S>: and it shall be an heave offering<S>8641</S> from the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> of the sacrifice<S>2077</S> of their peace offerings<S>8002</S>, even their heave offering<S>8641</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And the holy<S>6944</S> garments<S>899</S> of Aaron<S>175</S> shall be his sons'<S>1121</S> after<S>310</S> him, to be anointed<S>4888</S> therein, and to be consecrated<S>4390</S> <S>3027</S> in them.
And that son<S>1121</S> that is priest<S>3548</S> in his stead shall put<S>3847</S> them on seven<S>7651</S> days<S>3117</S>, when he cometh<S>935</S> into the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S> to minister<S>8334</S> in the holy<S>6944</S> place. <sup>that son: Heb. he of his sons</sup>
And thou shalt take<S>3947</S> the ram<S>352</S> of the consecration<S>4394</S>, and seethe<S>1310</S> his flesh<S>1320</S> in the holy<S>6918</S> place<S>4725</S>.
And Aaron<S>175</S> and his sons<S>1121</S> shall eat<S>398</S> the flesh<S>1320</S> of the ram<S>352</S>, and the bread<S>3899</S> that is in the basket<S>5536</S>, by the door<S>6607</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>.
And they shall eat<S>398</S> those things wherewith the atonement was made<S>3722</S>, to consecrate<S>4390</S> <S>3027</S> and to sanctify<S>6942</S> them: but a stranger<S>2114</S> shall not eat<S>398</S> thereof, because they are holy<S>6944</S>.
And if ought of the flesh<S>1320</S> of the consecrations<S>4394</S>, or of the bread<S>3899</S>, remain<S>3498</S> unto the morning<S>1242</S>, then thou shalt burn<S>8313</S> the remainder<S>3498</S> with fire<S>784</S>: it shall not be eaten<S>398</S>, because it is holy<S>6944</S>.
And thus shalt thou do<S>6213</S> unto Aaron<S>175</S>, and to his sons<S>1121</S>, according to all things which I have commanded<S>6680</S> thee: seven<S>7651</S> days<S>3117</S> shalt thou consecrate<S>4390</S> <S>3027</S> them.
And thou shalt offer<S>6213</S> every day<S>3117</S> a bullock<S>6499</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S> for atonement<S>3725</S>: and thou shalt cleanse<S>2398</S> the altar<S>4196</S>, when thou hast made an atonement<S>3722</S> for it, and thou shalt anoint<S>4886</S> it, to sanctify<S>6942</S> it.
Seven<S>7651</S> days<S>3117</S> thou shalt make an atonement<S>3722</S> for the altar<S>4196</S>, and sanctify<S>6942</S> it; and it shall be an altar<S>4196</S> most holy<S>6944</S> <S>6944</S>: whatsoever toucheth<S>5060</S> the altar<S>4196</S> shall be holy<S>6942</S>.
Now this is that which thou shalt offer<S>6213</S> upon the altar<S>4196</S>; two<S>8147</S> lambs<S>3532</S> of the first<S>1121</S> year<S>8141</S> day<S>3117</S> by day<S>3117</S> continually<S>8548</S>.
The one<S>259</S> lamb<S>3532</S> thou shalt offer<S>6213</S> in the morning<S>1242</S>; and the other<S>8145</S> lamb<S>3532</S> thou shalt offer<S>6213</S> at even<S>6153</S>:
And with the one<S>259</S> lamb<S>3532</S> a tenth<S>6241</S> deal of flour<S>5560</S> mingled<S>1101</S> with the fourth part<S>7253</S> of an hin<S>1969</S> of beaten<S>3795</S> oil<S>8081</S>; and the fourth part<S>7243</S> of an hin<S>1969</S> of wine<S>3196</S> for a drink offering<S>5262</S>.
And the other<S>8145</S> lamb<S>3532</S> thou shalt offer<S>6213</S> at even<S>6153</S>, and shalt do<S>6213</S> thereto according to the meat offering<S>4503</S> of the morning<S>1242</S>, and according to the drink offering<S>5262</S> thereof, for a sweet<S>5207</S> savour<S>7381</S>, an offering made by fire<S>801</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>.
This shall be a continual<S>8548</S> burnt offering<S>5930</S> throughout your generations<S>1755</S> at the door<S>6607</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>: where I will meet<S>3259</S> you, to speak<S>1696</S> there unto thee.
And there I will meet<S>3259</S> with the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, and the tabernacle shall be sanctified<S>6942</S> by my glory<S>3519</S>. <sup>the tabernacle: or, Israel</sup>
And I will sanctify<S>6942</S> the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, and the altar<S>4196</S>: I will sanctify<S>6942</S> also both Aaron<S>175</S> and his sons<S>1121</S>, to minister to me in the priest's office<S>3547</S>.
And I will dwell<S>7931</S> among<S>8432</S> the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, and will be their God<S>430</S>.
And they shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S> their God<S>430</S>, that brought them forth<S>3318</S> out of the land<S>776</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>, that I may dwell<S>7931</S> among<S>8432</S> them: I am the LORD<S>3068</S> their God<S>430</S>.
